Actions.Name: Get lobbyist bundlers for a specific committee
Actions.Description: Retrieves the most recent lobbyist bundlers reported by a specific committee.

Actions.Name: Get a candidate
Actions.Description: Retrieves a specific candidate.

Actions.Name: Get recently added candidates
Actions.Description: Retrieves the 20 most recently added candidates.

Actions.Name: Search for candidates
Actions.Description: Retrieves candidates by first or last name.

Actions.Name: Get candidates from a state
Actions.Description: Retrieves an array of FEC candidates for a given state (and optional chamber and district).

Actions.Name: Get top 20 candidates in specific financial category
Actions.Description: Retrieves the top 20 candidates within a given financial category for a given campaign cycle.

Actions.Name: Get committee filings
Actions.Description: Retrieves the 20 most recent FEC filings from the specified committee.

Actions.Name: Get a specific committee
Actions.Description: Retrieves a specific FEC committee for a given campaign cycle.

Actions.Name: Get leadership committees
Actions.Description: Retrieves committees designated as leadership PACs by the FEC.

Actions.Name: Get recently added committees
Actions.Description: Retrieves the 20 most recently added FEC committees.

Actions.Name: Get recently added independent expenditure-only committees
Actions.Description: Retrieves the 20 most recently added FEC independent expenditure-only committees, known as super PACs.

Actions.Name: Search for committees
Actions.Description: Retrieves a list of committees.

Actions.Name: Get electioneering communications by specific committee
Actions.Description: Retrieves the most recent broadcast advertisements by a specific committee that identify one or more federal candidates (and have aired 30 days before a primary election and 60 days before the general election).

Actions.Name: Get electioneering communications by date
Actions.Description: Retrieves all broadcast advertisements that identify one or more federal candidates (and have aired 30 days before a primary election and 60 days before the general election) from a specific date.

Actions.Name: Get recent electioneering communications
Actions.Description: Retrieves the 20 most recent broadcast advertisements that identify one or more federal candidates (and have aired 30 days before a primary election and 60 days before the general election).

Actions.Name: Get recent late contributions to a candidate
Actions.Description: Retrieves the most recent late contributions to a specific candidate.

Actions.Name: Get recent late contributions to a committee
Actions.Description: Retrieves the most recent late contributions to a specific committee.

Actions.Name: Get recent late contributions by date
Actions.Description: Retrieves late contributions from a specific date.

Actions.Name: Get recent late contributions
Actions.Description: During the last 20 days before a primary or general election, candidate committees must file reports of any contributions of $1,000 or more within 48 hours of receipt. This retrieves the most recent late contributions to candidates.

Actions.Name: Get independent expenditures that support or oppose a specific candidate
Actions.Description: Retrieves the 200 most recent independent expenditures in support of or opposition to a given candidate.

Actions.Name: Get independent expenditures by specific committee
Actions.Description: Retrieves the 20 most recent independent expenditures by a given committee.

Actions.Name: Get independent expenditures by date
Actions.Description: Retrieves all independent expenditures on a specific date (the date of activity, not the date filed with the FEC).

Actions.Name: Get independent expenditures office totals
Actions.Description: Retrieves the amount of money spent in independent expenditures for a given office (either House, Senate or President).

Actions.Name: Get independent expenditures that support or oppose presidential candidates
Actions.Description: Retrieves the 200 most recent independent expenditures in support of or opposition to any presidential candidate.

Actions.Name: Get independent expenditures race totals for a specific committee
Actions.Description: Retrieves the total amounts of money that a given committee has spent on individual races (consisting of a state, office and district) during a cycle.

Actions.Name: Get recent independent expenditures
Actions.Description: Retrieves the 200 most recent independent expenditures and optionally can be offset by multiples of 20.

Actions.Name: Get electronic filings by date
Actions.Description: Retrieves information about FEC reports filed electronically on a specific date.

Actions.Name: Get electronic filing form types
Actions.Description: Retrieves a list of available form types for FEC electronic filings.

Actions.Name: Search for electronic filings
Actions.Description: Retrieves information about FEC reports filed electronically by a committee.

Actions.Name: Get summary for a specific presidential electronic filing
Actions.Description: Retrieves summary figures from a specific FEC electronic filing (Form 3 filings by presidential candidates only).

Actions.Name: Get electronic filings by type
Actions.Description: Retrieves the most recent electronic filings by form type.
